book.synopsis: The Better Homes and Gardens guide to decorating a second home offers plentiful advice on how to furnish and remodel beach houses, lakefront property, cabins in the woods, and a variety of other vacation or getaway dwellings.
book.title_long: Second Home: Find Your Place in the Fun (Better Homes and Gardens(R))
